official.headline: Enhanced Safety Measures
official.anchor_line: Biometric checkpoints now keep Stenograd secure after recent unrest.
official.contextual_reframing: Council assures that new BCI protocols streamline safety and public order for all citizens. BCI, the Behavioral Compliance Index, ensures seamless services based on civic alignment.

official.headline: Privilege Pathways Updated
official.anchor_line: Citizens experience smoother access and fairer privileges linked to BCI alignment.
official.contextual_reframing: System adjustments guarantee trusted individuals maintain access. Dynamic, data-driven governance adapts quickly for collective benefit.

official.headline: Public Life Maintained
official.anchor_line: Collective spirit endures as calm prevails across all districts despite minor disruptions.
official.contextual_reframing: Efficient management from the Council keeps Stenograd stable. Automated, algorithmic solutions empower everyday life without interruption.

underground.headline: Checkpoints Everywhere
underground.anchor_line: New biometric scans trap more citizens each hour, all justified by vague 'unrest'.
underground.contextual_reframing: This isn't just about safety. The BCI—a system scoring everything you do—now locks down basic life for anyone seen as 'out of line'. Privacy and dignity disappear first.

underground.headline: Silence Or Else
underground.anchor_line: Public debate ended overnight. Speak up and your BCI score drops, privileges gone.
underground.contextual_reframing: The Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, rewards perfect obedience and erases the rest. Resistance is forced underground as the system tightens its grip and Council elections vanish without a sound.

underground.headline: Ghosted And Gone
underground.anchor_line: Reports spread of ghost citizens erased after secret detentions and crackdowns.
underground.contextual_reframing: If the system flags you, you vanish—lost privileges, blocked access. Ghosts aren't just rumors. In Stenograd, the machine polices itself, leaving the city's wounds hidden behind silent screens.
